mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.authorities_name, a.authorities_desc, a.enabled, a.is_system FROM user_info ui JOIN user_role ur ON ui.`id` = ur.`user_id` JOIN role_authorities ra ON ur.`role_id` = ra.`role_id` JOIN authorities a ON ra.`authorities_id` = a.`id` WHERE ui.`id` = #{userId}
